### Contracting Entity

### End-User

### Contact Information

* Francois S. Martineau (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

### Solicitation Description
This solicitation of offers is for the acquisition of a Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) including training and delivery in Quebec City, Quebec, as per the Statement of Requirements. An optional supplemental antenna is also included in the procurement.

Note: The existing solicitation number (Doc4300745311) is hereby cancelled and superseded by the current solicitation.

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offerors who provided a bid on the previous solicitation.

### Access to Solicitation
The full solicitation package can be accessed on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18692484](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18692484)

---

### Note
All communications related to this solicitation must be made through the designated contact person or email. Offerors are required to review the solicitation package thoroughly before submitting a bid
